mapper.select: SELECT a.schedule_no, a.schedule_name, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM tbl_schedule a LEFT JOIN tbl_class b ON a.class_no = b.class_no LEFT JOIN tbl_user c ON b.user_id = c.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{id} AND a.delete_yn = 'N' AND b.delete_yn = 'N' AND c.delete_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_calendar (user_id, calendar_title, calendar_content, start_date, important_yn) VALUES (#{userId}, #{calendarTitle}, #{calendarContent}, #{startDate}, #{importantYn})
mapper.select:
